item.title: 全球经济 美国关税风险虽略有缓解，但亚洲工厂仍步履维艰
item.description: 由于美国关税的不确定性导致需求低迷，许多亚洲经济体的工厂活动在6月份出现萎缩，但在该地区经济复苏前景黯淡的情况下，制造商略有宽松的迹象提高了与华盛顿贸易谈判的风险。【原文：Factory activity in many Asian economies shrank in June as U.S. tariff uncertainty kept demand low, but signs of modest relief for manufacturers raise the stakes in trade talks with Washington amid the region's gloomy economic recovery prospects.】

item.title: 高盛预计美联储将在 2025 年降息三次
item.description: 华尔街券商高盛（Goldman Sachs）周一表示，预计美国联邦储备委员会今年将降息三个季度，理由是关税效应减弱和劳动力市场疲软。【原文：Goldman Sachs expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver three quarter-point interest rate cuts this year, the Wall Street brokerage said on Monday, citing muted tariff effects and labor market weakness.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，好时公司将在 2027 年之前从其零食中剔除合成染料
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，好时公司（Hershey Co）将在 2027 年底前从其零食中去除合成染料，成为越来越多寻求与美国卫生部门指令保持一致的公司中的最新一家。【原文：Hershey Co will remove synthetic dyes from its snacks by the end of 2027, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, making it the latest in a growing list of companies seeking to align with directives from U.S. health authorities.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，美元走软，因美国法案争论不休；黄金跳涨
item.description: 周二，在市场等待对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普具有里程碑意义的税收和支出法案进行投票之际，亚洲股市悄然走高，美元在多年低点附近徘徊。【原文：Asian shares crept higher and the dollar languished near multi-year lows on Tuesday as markets awaited a vote over U.S. President Donald Trump's landmark tax and spending legislation.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示中国6月工厂活动恢复增长
item.description: 周二进行的一项私营部门调查显示，在新订单增加从而提高产量的支撑下，中国工厂活动在 6 月份恢复扩张。【原文：China's factory activity returned to expansion in June, supported by an increase in new orders that lifted production, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称，马斯克的 xAI 公司新债和股票各融资 50 亿美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周一表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司已经完成了 50 亿美元的债务融资，同时还获得了 50 亿美元的战略股权投资。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI has completed a $5 billion debt raise alongside a separate $5 billion strategic equity investment, Morgan Stanley said on Monday, as the startup looks to expand its AI infrastructure through data centres amid intensifying competition in the industry.】

item.title: 特朗普税改法案和关税拖累美元走软
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的支出法案激起了财政忧虑，贸易协议的不确定性继续拖累市场情绪，美元兑欧元汇率周二跌至2021年9月以来的最弱水平。【原文：The U.S. dollar languished at its weakest against the euro since September 2021 on Tuesday, as President Donald Trump's spending bill stoked fiscal worries and uncertainty around trade deals continued to weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 欧佩克+供应增加的预期和关税担忧导致石油价格下跌
item.description: 受欧佩克+8 月增产预期和美国提高关税前景导致经济放缓的担忧影响，油价周二下跌。【原文：Oil prices edged down on Tuesday, weighed by expectations of an OPEC+ output hike in August and concerns of an economic slowdown driven by prospects of higher U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 韩国出口受科技推动反弹，但美国和中国发货量跌幅扩大
item.description: 本周二的贸易数据显示，由于科技需求强劲，韩国 6 月份的出口有所增长，而 5 月份则出现了四个月来的首次下降，尽管在关税不确定性的影响下，韩国对美国和中国的出口依然疲软。【原文：South Korea's exports rose in June on the back of strong tech demand, after falling in May for the first time in four months, trade data showed on Tuesday, though shipments to the U.S. and China remained weak amid tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 日本央行调查显示，尽管存在关税风险，但日本企业情绪有所改善
item.description: 日本央行周二的一项调查显示，截至6月份的三个月中，日本大型制造商的商业景气意外改善，这表明企业仍在等待美国大幅关税可能带来的冲击的明朗化。【原文：Business sentiment among Japan's big manufacturers unexpectedly improved in the three months to June, a central bank survey showed on Tuesday, a sign companies are still awaiting clarity on the potential hit from steep U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 庞巴迪获得 17 亿美元飞机订单及服务协议
item.description: 庞巴迪周一表示，公司已收到50架挑战者（Challenger）和环球（Global）飞机的订单以及一份服务协议，总价值17亿美元，计划于2027年开始交付。【原文：Bombardier said on Monday it had received an order for 50 of its Challenger and Global aircraft, alongside a service agreement, valued collectively at $1.7 billion, with deliveries scheduled to commence in 2027.】

item.title: 智库称新西兰第二季度商业信心有所改善
item.description: 一家私人智库周二表示，新西兰第二季度的商业信心有所增强，有迹象表明通胀压力正在缓解。【原文：New Zealand's business confidence improved in the second quarter, a private think tank said on Tuesday, amid indications that inflationary pressures were easing.】

item.title: 巴西反垄断监管机构的技术机构建议在 iOS 案件中裁定苹果败诉
item.description: 巴西反垄断监管机构 CADE 的技术机构周一建议对苹果公司作出裁决，因为该机构称苹果公司在其 iOS 生态系统中存在反竞争行为。【原文：The technical body of Brazilian antitrust regulator CADE recommended on Monday a decision against Apple for what it called anti-competitive practices in the tech giant's iOS ecosystem.】

item.title: OpenAI 表示没有使用谷歌内部芯片的计划
item.description: 在路透社和其他新闻机构报道人工智能实验室转向其竞争对手的人工智能芯片以满足日益增长的需求两天后，OpenAI 表示，它没有使用谷歌内部芯片为其产品提供动力的积极计划。【原文：OpenAI said it has no active plans to use Google's in-house chip to power its products, two days after Reuters and other news outlets reported on the AI lab's move to turn to its competitor's artificial intelligence chips to meet growing demand.】

item.title: 与伊朗有关的黑客威胁要公开特朗普助手的电子邮件
item.description: 与伊朗有联系的黑客威胁要披露更多从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的圈子里窃取的电子邮件，此前他们已在 2024 年美国大选前向媒体分发了一批邮件。【原文：Iran-linked hackers have threatened to disclose more emails stolen from U.S. President Donald Trump's circle, after distributing a prior batch to the media ahead of the 2024 U.S. election.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为明年初布伦特油价将达到 60 美元/桶
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在周一的一份报告中称，随着市场供应充足以及以色列与伊朗关系缓和后地缘政治风险减弱，布伦特原油可能会在明年初回调至每桶 60 美元左右。【原文：Brent crude will likely retrace to around $60 per barrel by early next year, with the market being well supplied and geopolitical risk abating following the Israel-Iran de-escalation, Morgan Stanley said in a note on Monday.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 申请破产保护以削减不断恶化的债务，股价大涨
item.description: Wolfspeed 周一表示，该公司已申请破产保护，在电动汽车和工业市场需求放缓的情况下，这家芯片制造商正努力应对巨额债务。【原文：Wolfspeed said on Monday it has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, as the chipmaker grapples with huge debt amid slowing demand from electric vehicle and industrial markets.】

item.title: Todd Boehly 支持的 Accelerant 申请在美国上市
item.description: 托德-伯利（Todd Boehly）支持的保险科技公司 Accelerant 周一在美国提交了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Todd Boehly-backed insurance tech company Accelerant filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Monday.】

item.title: 司法部宣布逮捕和起诉朝鲜 IT 工人计划
item.description: 美国司法部和联邦调查局周一宣布了一项针对朝鲜所谓的 "IT 工人 "计划的逮捕和起诉。在该计划中，朝鲜人获得了 100 多家美国公司的远程 IT 相关职位，并利用这些权限从全球众多公司窃取资金和信息。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice and FBI on Monday announced an arrest and indictments targeting North Korea’s so-called “IT worker” program, where North Koreans obtain remote IT-related positions at more than 100 U.S. companies, and use that access to steal money and information from a host of companies around the world.】

item.title: 加征关税截止日期前与美国主要伙伴的贸易谈判现状
item.description: 来自十多个美国主要贸易伙伴的谈判代表正急于在7月9日的最后期限前与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府达成协议，以避免进口关税跃升至更高水平。【原文：Negotiators from more than a dozen major U.S. trading partners are rushing to reach agreements with U.S. President Donald Trump's administration by a July 9 deadline to avoid import tariffs jumping to higher levels, and Trump and his team kept up the pressure on Monday.】

item.title: 美国农业部宣布分阶段重新开放墨西哥牛的进口
item.description: 美国农业部周一宣布分阶段重新开放从墨西哥进口的牛、野牛和马匹，此前墨西哥曾因新世界螺旋虫这一危害性害虫而长期关闭进口。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture announced on Monday a phased reopening of cattle, bison and equine imports from Mexico following a prolonged closure over the damaging pest New World screwworm.】

item.title: 交易日：以历史新高结束上半年
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克再次批评特朗普支出法案，呼吁成立新政党
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一重申了他对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）支出立法的批评，认为这凸显了建立一个新政党的必要性。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk reiterated his criticism of U.S. President Donald Trump's spending legislation on Monday, arguing that it underscores the need for a new political party.】

item.title: 波音任命耶稣-杰伊-马拉维为新任首席财务官
item.description: 波音公司周一表示，已任命耶稣-杰伊-马拉维（Jesus 'Jay' Malave）为该公司新任首席财务官，自 8 月 15 日起生效。【原文：Boeing Co said on Monday it had appointed Jesus 'Jay' Malave as the planemaker's new CFO, effective Aug. 15.】

item.title: 独家报道Circle 首次公开募股大获成功后申请美国信托银行执照
item.description: 稳定币公司Circle正在申请在美国创建一家国家信托银行，这是该公司本月早些时候进行首次公开募股（IPO），估值近180亿美元之后的一项重大举措。【原文：Stablecoin firm Circle is applying to create a national trust bank in the U.S., a major move after its blockbuster IPO valued the company at nearly $18 billion earlier this month.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Meta 通过 "超级智能 "实验室深化人工智能发展
item.description: 据知情人士周一透露，Meta 公司首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）已经重组了公司的人工智能工作，将其归入一个名为 Meta 超级智能实验室（Meta Superintelligence Labs）的新部门。【原文：Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has reorganized the company's artificial intelligence efforts under a new division called Meta Superintelligence Labs, according to a source on Monday.】

item.title: 法庭文件称，派拉蒙与特朗普正在进行 "高级 "和解谈判
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司和唐纳德-特朗普总统正在进行 "真诚、先进的和解谈判"，以解决特朗普 10 月份对哥伦比亚广播公司提起的诉讼，指控该公司对时任副总统卡马拉-哈里斯的 "60 分钟 "采访进行了欺骗性编辑。【原文：Paramount Global and President Donald Trump are engaged in "good faith, advanced, settlement negotiations" to resolve a lawsuit filed by Trump against CBS in October, alleging the network deceptively edited a "60 Minutes" interview with then-vice president Kamala Harris.】

item.title: 经纪公司伯恩斯坦称，梅赛德斯-奔驰预计第二季度利润率将因关税问题受挫不到 3
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）在季度业绩发布前的投资者例行电话会议后，经纪公司伯恩斯坦（Bernstein）在一份说明中写道，预计第二季度与关税有关的不利因素对其核心汽车部门利润率的影响将低于 3%。【原文：Mercedes-Benz expects tariff-related headwinds to the profit margin at its core cars division to be less than 3% in the second quarter, brokerage Bernstein wrote in a note, following a regular investor call ahead of quarterly results.】

item.title: 拉加德：欧元区通胀波动加剧
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一表示，不确定性必将继续成为全球经济的一个主要特征，可能会使通胀更加不稳定，并要求欧洲央行采取更有力的行动，使物价保持在其目标附近。【原文：Uncertainty is bound to remain a key feature of the global economy, likely making inflation more volatile and requiring the ECB to act more forcefully to keep prices around its target, ECB President Christine Lagarde said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司权衡使用 Anthropic 或 OpenAI 为 Siri 提供动力，这是一次重大逆转
item.description: 彭博新闻社周一援引熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道称，苹果公司正在权衡使用 Anthropic 或 OpenAI 的人工智能技术来支持新版 Siri，而不是自己的内部模型。【原文：Apple is weighing using artificial intelligence technology from Anthropic or OpenAI to power a new version of Siri, instead of its own in-house models, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】
